body: This ring operates exactly like a ring of feather falling. However, it also makes the wearer clumsy. She takes a –4 penalty to Dexterity and has a 20% chance of spell failure when trying to cast any arcane spell that has a somatic component. (This chance of spell failure stacks with other arcane spell failure chances.)
name: Ring of Clumsiness
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Cursed Items/Specific Cursed Items/Ring of Clumsiness
